title: SVP of Software Engineering (Trilogy)
body:
Leading Trilogy's new products engineering department of 30 engineers to build, maintain and operate all our new products, spanning from mobile apps to 3D games: TeachTap, TeachTales, Reading Critters, Magic Academy, Athena, the Crossover Hiring Platform and the Trilogy Sales Platform.

Responsible for hiring, management, setting up our internal processes, technical leadership, coaching and mentoring the engineers, defining and spearheading our AI adoption strategy, etc.
